Articles.Content:
when i was just messing around visual studio, i found this in assembly-CSharp

tools for EVA\'s?
My guess is that this is for the Kerbals that walk around the VAB and SPH?
havent seen them use these, maybe there will be a chance of a part/engine breaking in orbit, you having to EVA repair it?

If you watch closely you\'ll see them busy with all those tools, listed there.

Hammering away with a wrench, tightening invisible bolts etc
I agree, that EVA is far to far in it\'s infantcy for the to be pre-implemented, however rare in flight repairs would be cool.
Perhaps we\'ll be able to have our brave kerbalnauts do in-flight removal or addition of parts? like a orbital shipyard?
